title: J Something gifts his wife a Mercedes Benz to celebrate their anniversary
text:
J Something gifts his wife a Mercedes Benz to celebrate their anniversary share this

Cape Town - It is no secret that musician and chef J Something is a hopeless romantic.

From constantly praising his wife on social media to serenading her and now buying her a brand new Mercedes Benz – it’s safe to say he is whipped!

READ MORE: WATCH: J Something does a soulful acoustic rendition of Shesha Geza

Sharing the moment on his Instagram page, the Heavenly Sent hit-maker posted a picture of his wife Cordelia, sitting inside the luxurious car and wished her a happy anniversary in the caption.

“Happy anniversary boo. I hope you enjoy your new whip. I love you to the moon and back,” he wrote.

The couple has been together for many years and made things official after J Something paid lobola for Cordelia in 2015. They also welcomed their son in 2017.

Read More: Celebs who got hitched secretly

Take a look at J Something’s wife in her new whip below:
description: It is no secret that musician and chef J Something is a hopeless romantic.
